keyMoments.title: Kakukaku Discusses Iceburg's Shooting
keyMoments.description: Kakukaku appears among the Water 7 townspeople discussing the attempted assassination of Mayor Iceburg, expressing concern and engaging in speculation about who could be responsible.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this Water 7 resident who represents the intellectual community concerned about their mayor's fate.

reveals.information: Has distinctive rectangular and square-like facial features including a rectangular head, rectangular nose, and black hair
Is erudite and loves lengthy discussions but gets scared easily and trembles when afraid

keyMoments.title: Dr. Kyukyu Treats Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Dr. Kyukyu examines the comatose Iceburg at the hospital following the assassination attempt, providing medical care to Water 7's critically injured mayor.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance as the doctor treating Iceburg, establishing the medical response to the crisis and the severity of Iceburg's condition.

relationships.description: Dr. Kyukyu serves as Iceburg's doctor following the assassination attempt.

evolutionMoments.description: Examines and treats the comatose Iceburg after he was shot five times.

reveals.information: A partly bald man with a red nose, medical cross on his forehead, bushy mustache, and bushy hair
Works as a doctor in Water 7
His name in Japanese (救急) means 'first aid' or 'emergency'
